item.title: Overgrown trees over pavements, 11th February
item.description:
The trees next to the bishops Cleeve bypass are overgrown and overhang the pavements with brambles. Also the height of the trees mean the streetlights will be covered when the leaves return. The branches are now overhanging neighbouring properties.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
